title: Zulu Secrets Revealed: Dancing, Rituals, and Ancient Traditions
content: Ukunyakaza kuthuthukiswa ingubo yempi ehlaba umxhwele yezimpaphe nezikhumba zezilwane. Ukuchuma kwezikhali zamasiko ezifakwe kusigqi esiphephulayo kwengeza embukwaneni omangalisayo wokunyakaza okuhambisanayo okunamandla. Kodwa ukugida ngesiko lamaZulu akukona kuphela okuhambisana nempi. Uthando lwabo lokudansa lubonakala emisebenzini eminingi yokugubha njengemishado, amaphathi kanye nokukhula. Ukusetshenziswa kwezikhumba kunokubaluleka okungokomfanekiso. Izikhumba zezingwe zazigcinelwe amakhosi. Nakuba izikhumba ze-serval zazisho umuntu osondelene nenkosi. Isikhumba senkomo kanye nemisila yenkomo isetshenziswa kakhulu kuma-leggings, amabhande asekhanda, ama-beshus, amahawu kanye nezigubhu, kanti imisila ivame ukuthathwa ezimbuzini ze-Angora. Isiko lokudansa liye lenziwa kuze kube yilolu suku futhi lithola inkundla emikhosini yokudansa yaminyaka yonke nemincintiswano. Izindlela zokudansa eziyinkimbinkimbi zamaqembu ahlukahlukene zihlelekile futhi zihlanganisa amasiko nomthetho wezizwe ezidluliselwe ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. Kumvakashi ofuna ukudansa okuyiqiniso endaweni yemvelo kunezindawo eziningi zamasiko KwaZulu-Natal lapho leli siko elidumile lingazibonela mathupha khona ..... ihlathi noma ihlathi elivulekile - lapho ukunyakaza nomsindo kuhlangene amalangabi kuthatha incazelo ephakeme emoyeni onganyakazi ebusuku. Okwengeza kusimo sesigqi esishayayo yileli thuluzi elenziwe ngesikhumba senkomo elinwetshwe ohlangothini olulodwa lohlaka. Umsindo ohlabayo udalwa umdlali omanzisa iminwe bese eyidonsa ngenduku ebushelelezi exhunywe ngaphakathi kwesikhumba. Kodwa-ke akukho okudlula ukuthathwa kukabhiya ophekwe ekhaya nokudla ukudla kwesiZulu. Izithako eziyisisekelo zikabhiya ummbila noma ummbila kanye namabele ngokulinganayo Ummbila ugaywa etsheni lokugaya bese uphekwa ngamabele ube iphalishi eliwugqinsi, elifana nalokhu okuqinile lifakwe kubhasikidi wokusanhlamvu. Kubalulekile ukuhlonipha ubhiya nomuntu owenzayo, noma amadlozi acasuke. Ngemva kokuvubela ingxube iyasefa futhi okuqinile okusele kuphakelwa izinkukhu noma izimbongolo - zombili ziyingxenye kakhulu kubhiya. Imiphumela engemihle yengxube ezilwaneni iqoshwe ekulingiseni okupopayi kwamakhosi kwembongolo edakiwe. Abesifazane abenze ubhiya bahamba ngendlela yokugcina. Igwebu liyasuswa libekwe phansi kudliwe amadlozi. Azikho izitsha ezenziwe ngokhuni. Kuthiwa uma usebenzisa induku yokhuni amadoda avele acasuke aqale ukulwa Uma sekwenziwe ubhiya alethule kumyeni wakhe kube wusuku olubuhlungu kuyena uma lungagculisi. Phakathi kokudla okuyisisekelo ummbila. Izinhlamvu zigxotshwa esiqwini sesihlahla esinezimbobo - kunalokho kukhandla kakhulu kunomshini wokudla osebenza ngogesi, nakuba umuhle kakhulu! Lolu hlobo lomsebenzi lwanele ukwakha ukoma! Ukugaya phakathi kwamatshe omfula amabili kukhiqiza ukudla kommbila. Ummbila ophukile (isitambu) uvame ukuhlanganiswa nobhontshisi ocebile ngamaprotheni....nakuba sixwayiswa ukuthi kunezingozi ezithile ekudleni ubhontshisi.. lona ubhontshisi wezinsouma ungawupheki kahle, uzowudla. uthole ukuthi uzoba nomculo omningi ebusuku. Isikhumba sezinkabi kwake kwasetshenziswa ukwenza amahawu - indlela yokwenza amahawu yafezwa uShaka. Ngaphambi kukaShaka amabutho amabili alwayo ayebamba amahawu amancane kakhulu ejikijelana ngemikhonto kwathi uma efika endaweni yesigameko kwashintsha. Kwaba ukulwa ngesandla esisodwa futhi kwadingeka ethule lesi sihlangu esikhulu futhi njengoba usibona kungcono.floppy Floppy. Ngakho-ke ngemuva kwesihlangu baphusha le nduku engumusila. Kanjalo .okuyiqinisayo, uyabona manje ayisaphumi, ngakho-ke uhamba aqonde kumbangi wakhe futhi ngesandla sobunxele sehawu lakhe, ahuge ihawu lombangi wakhe alidonsele eceleni ukuze asale engenalutho esifubeni sakhe. umgwaze ngomkhonto ogwazayo!" Njengezinye izikhali zabo, amahawu aqhubekile nokuba neqhaza elikhulu esikweni lamaZulu anamuhla. Ezikhathini zangaphambi kukaShaka izizwe zazijikijela imikhonto noma ama-assegais ukulwa. UShaka ngokwakhe wethula umkhonto omfushane wokugwaza ukuze bahlangane eduze. Imisebenzi yezandla yokwenza le mikhonto isaqhutshwa nanamuhla ngabakhandi bensimbi bakwaZulu ezindaweni ezikude zasemakhaya nasezigodini ezikhethekile. Kukwezinye zalezi zindawo eziqhelile lapho abacwaningi bemivubukulo bethole khona izinto ezimangalisayo zesiZulu ezihlobene nesikhathi sokuqala sensimbi. Ukuhluka kwalesi sitezi ekuqaleni kwe-Iron Age ukuthi kungesinye sezitezi ezimbalwa ezigciniwe ezitholiwe. Ukuthi lishile ngengozi noma lishiswe ngamabomu esingakazi, kodwa ubumba nobulongwe bubhakile futhi buye basinda ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Enye yezinto eziphawuleka kakhulu zezinto zobuciko ezasala lapha yilawa matshe okugaya ayisicaba. Azinawo umganu ongathi uma zigaywa zikhombisa ukugaywa kwamabele noma amabele. Lokhu kusikisela okwengeziwe kokulungiswa kwemithi ye-herbal. Isici sale ndawo yasekhaya lapho imisebenzi yabesifazane ibusa khona, imigodi emikhulu yokusanhlamvu. Umsebenzi wemigodi yokusanhlamvu ukugcina okusanhlamvu kule ndawo yase-Afrika phakathi nezinyanga zokucindezeleka, kanye nenqubo ethakazelisayo: imigodi yayigqitshwa ngobulongwe, okusanhlamvu okusanhlamvu kwakufakwa ezimbizeni noma kubhasikidi bese kuvalwa. Inani lemfucumfucu eyaphuma kulo mgodi yayizobonisa ukugcwalisa ngokushesha okukhulu amatshe okugaya amaningi asasebenza ngokuphambene nenani elincane kakhulu lemfucumfucu eyinqwaba eyaphuma kulo mgodi ojule kakhulu empeleni owawugcwele kakhulu  ake ngehle. Lokhu kungaphezu kwamamitha angu-2 ukujula kugcwele umlotha nokushanela kwasekhaya. Njengoba ubona kulo mgodi sinamathambo ezinkomo kusikisela ukuthi kwenziwa isiko elithile lapha, futhi ngokwesifaniso mhlawumbe kukhululwe imimoya - imimoya yokhokho babantu ababehlala kulo muzi. Izinsalela zamabhodwe asendlini zihlale ziwumthombo obalulekile wolwazi kubavubukuli....... Esikhathini esibhekene naso okuyiNondonwane  8th, 9th century, Igqama ngokuntuleka kokuhlobisa entanyeni. bese kuba umhlobiso lapho kuhlangana intamo yomzimba ebhodweni. Ibhodwe belizoma la....nalu udebe igolo bese kuthi ibhodwe elicwebile libe ngezansi. Lawa amatshe okugaya ikakhulukazi okusanhlamvu okufana namabele kanye namabele okuyizinhlamvu ezincane ezisanhlamvu - kudingeka zigcinwe zisondelene ngesikhathi sokugaya futhi umshini wokugaya ongaphezulu ube usuthuthukisa lezi zimpawu eziningi ekugayeni okusanhlamvu ukuze kulungiswe okusanhlamvu. Okunye okuthakazelisa kakhulu okutholwe emigodini esiyivubukule kulo muzi, indlu encane, ukungcwatshwa kwengane embizeni. Ngakho-ke ungabona ukuthi akuwona umgodi ojulile uma uqhathanisa neminye emibili, futhi lokhu kungenzeka ukuthi ingane ezelwe isishonile noma ingane eyafa ngesikhathi izalwa futhi lokho kukude lapho singathatha khona ukuhunyushwa manje. Umuntu ubhekana nenqwaba yemfucumfucu lapho kumbiwa futhi lokhu ngandlela thile kubuyisela isakhi somuntu kuso futhi - le nhlekelele yabantu eneminyaka engu-1,300 ubudala egcinwe ebhodweni. EsiGodini soThukela ekujuleni kwenkaba yeKwaZulu Natal abavubukuli bathole ubufakazi be-talc deposits eyasetshenzwa ngezandla zabantu eminyakeni eyi-1500 edlule. Lesi siza satholwa ngeminyaka yawo-1970 futhi sasingesinye sezinkomba zokuqala zokuthi imiphakathi yenkathi yensimbi eTugela Basin yayisebenzisa i-talc schist. Siyazi ngokuhlala abantu ngenxa yamatshe okugaya agcwele indawo yonke, bese, kube, i-talc elapha esizeni okusobala ukuthi yayisetshenziswa yilaba bantu ngenxa yezinhloso zobuhle. Impushana ethambile ekhiqizwa ku-micaceous talc schist ukunikeza igama layo elilungile, yaxutshwa namanzi futhi yafakwa ebusweni. ....njengoba sibona lapha, izinto eziningi eziyisicefe edwaleni. Ukukhiqizwa kwezingcezu zobucwebe - lena i-pendant engaqediwe, iphalethi elincane elincane. futhi omunye umfanekiso ongaqediwe oshiya okuningi emcabangweni. Indlela engichaza ngayo lezi zici eziyisicefe ukuthi abantu empeleni babegaya idwala le-talc ukuze bathole impushana. Impushana ethambile yaxutshwa namanzi yagcotshwa ebusweni - okuyisiko elisetshenziswa esikweni lamaZulu nanamuhla ukufeza izinhloso zokuzicwala nezingokwesiko. Ayisebenzi nje kuphela njenge-sunscreen kanye ne-moisturizer kodwa inokusetshenziswa okungokomfanekiso futhi. Amantombazane amancane athunyelwa ngemiyalezo kwesinye isibaya nawo amemezela inhloso yawo ngokudweba okumhlophe ebusweni. ....bese kudwetshwa umzimba wonke ngomhloshana kuyisiko elisetshenziswa ekuthwaseni kwentsha yamaZulu namaXhosa. Ubumba olumhlophe emizimbeni luwuphawu lokuzihlukanisa nomphakathi. Ekupheleni kokuthwasa bayolahla izingubo zabo futhi bageze ubumba olumhlophe emizimbeni yabo. Qalisa izangoma ngokwesibonelo ukugqoka i-ocher emhlophe ngesikhathi sokuqeqeshwa. Uma usufanelekele izinguquko zombala. Ngaleyo ndlela umphakathi wonkana uyakwazi ukubona isangoma esiqeqeshiwe nesinekhono. Isangoma sinekhono ekuxilongeni izifo nasekulungiseni ama-muti. Isimo sakhe kanye nomsebenzi wakhe kukhonjiswa yisigqoko sakhe kanye nemvunulo yakhe. Ubuhlalu bugaxwa izihibe ukuze imimoya ebiziwe ibe nendawo yokuhlala lapho ikhuluma ezindlebeni zezangoma. Amathambo esangoma abaluleke kakhulu kuso njengoba i-stethoscope ibaluleke kakhulu kudokotela ekuxilongweni kwaso. Uwasebenzisela ukuxhumana namadlozi. Imimoya yamadlozi ivunywa ukuthi ihlale ikhona - kuthiwe igada umndeni. Kwenzelwe ngisho indawo yokulala eqhugwaneni. Ngifuna ukukukhombisa okuthile kimi okubaluleke kakhulu. Njengoba ubona lapha ngemuva kweqhugwane..... njalo ngemuva kweqhugwana, kukhona lo mqansana. Manje emva kwalolu gquma sekuyindawo engcwele kakhulu esikweni lamaZulu uma kwenzeka le ndawo okuhlala kuyona ngoba amaZulu akholelwa ekukhonzeni amadlozi futhi akholelwa ukuthi imimoya yamadlozi ibuthana ngemuva kwalesi sikhala esincane ebusuku. Bakholelwa ukuthi kunesimbozo esincanyana phakathi kwaleli zwe nelizayo, yingakho bekhuluma nokhokho babo sengathi bangabantu abaphilayo ngoba bayasibona futhi bayasizwa. Futhi babatshela ngamashwa abo kanye nezinhlanhla zabo futhi uma benza lokho, bafika ngemuva kweqhugwane bakhulume nabo. Kwesinye isikhathi baba neziphuzo zikabhiya namadili okuhlonipha amadlozi bese bewabekele ukudla neziphuzo ngemuva kwalesi sikhala esincane. Manje sebeyazi kusobala ukuthi ngeke besahlanganyela kodwa amadlozi ngoba bayasibona futhi bayasizwa kumele babone ukuthi izinto zenziwa ngokuhlonishwa kwabo bese izinto zibahambela kahle. Ubuhlalu busetshenziselwa kakhulu kokubili izinjongo zokuhlobisa nezingokomfanekiso. Kulo mdwebo wobuhlalu amaZulu aveza ukuthokozela kwawo umbala ngobuciko obungokwakuqala nobomuntu siqu. Zigqokwa ngamadoda akwaZulu - uphawu lothando luqukethe umyalezo wothandiweyo wakhe. Nakuba imibala inezincazelo ezivamile umlayezo ohlanganiswe esihlokweni ngasinye ungowomuntu siqu futhi ungaqondwa kuphela izithandani nabangane abambalwa abaseduze bomenzi. Nakuba singakwazi ukufunda umlayezo onembile walezi zimpawu zothando, siyazi ukuthi umhlophe ubonisa ukuhlanzeka nothando, okubomvu kuwuthando oluningi naphezu kobumpofu, kodwa umbala obomvana ubonisa ubumpofu obukhulu, ikakhulukazi ukungakwazi ukukhokhela i-labola intengo yomshado kamakoti. Abethulwa eNingizimu Afrika ngeminyaka yawo-1890 ababedonsa orisho, eminyakeni eyi-10 kamuva ukuthandwa kwaleli tekisi lale ndoda empofu kwase kukhule kangangokuthi abangu-2,000 bagcwala emigwaqweni yaseThekwini. Abantu abangamaZulu banamuhla bangase bahluke kakhulu esizweni esifana nempi sekhulunyaka elidlule kodwa amasiko abo anothile aphila ukuze bonke bajabulele ikhulunyaka elizayo.

Njengoba ubona kulo mgodi sinamathambo ezinkomo kusikisela ukuthi kwenziwa isiko elithile lapha, futhi ngokwesifaniso mhlawumbe kukhululwe imimoya - imimoya yokhokho babantu ababehlala kulo muzi.
Izinsalela zamabhodwe asendlini zihlale ziwumthombo obalulekile wolwazi kubavubukuli.......
Esikhathini esibhekene naso okuyiNondonwane  8th, 9th century, Igqama ngokuntuleka kokuhlobisa entanyeni.
bese kuba umhlobiso lapho kuhlangana intamo yomzimba ebhodweni.
Ibhodwe belizoma la....nalu udebe igolo bese kuthi ibhodwe elicwebile libe ngezansi.

Lawa amatshe okugaya ikakhulukazi okusanhlamvu okufana namabele kanye namabele okuyizinhlamvu ezincane ezisanhlamvu - kudingeka zigcinwe zisondelene ngesikhathi sokugaya futhi umshini wokugaya ongaphezulu ube usuthuthukisa lezi zimpawu eziningi ekugayeni okusanhlamvu ukuze kulungiswe okusanhlamvu.
Okunye okuthakazelisa kakhulu okutholwe emigodini esiyivubukule kulo muzi, indlu encane, ukungcwatshwa kwengane embizeni.

Ngakho-ke ungabona ukuthi akuwona umgodi ojulile uma uqhathanisa neminye emibili, futhi lokhu kungenzeka ukuthi ingane ezelwe isishonile noma ingane eyafa ngesikhathi izalwa futhi lokho kukude lapho singathatha khona ukuhunyushwa manje.
Umuntu ubhekana nenqwaba yemfucumfucu lapho kumbiwa futhi lokhu ngandlela thile kubuyisela isakhi somuntu kuso futhi - le nhlekelele yabantu eneminyaka engu-1,300 ubudala egcinwe ebhodweni.
EsiGodini soThukela ekujuleni kwenkaba yeKwaZulu Natal abavubukuli bathole ubufakazi be-talc deposits eyasetshenzwa ngezandla zabantu eminyakeni eyi-1500 edlule.
Lesi siza satholwa ngeminyaka yawo-1970 futhi sasingesinye sezinkomba zokuqala zokuthi imiphakathi yenkathi yensimbi eTugela Basin yayisebenzisa i-talc schist.
Siyazi ngokuhlala abantu ngenxa yamatshe okugaya agcwele indawo yonke, bese, kube, i-talc elapha esizeni okusobala ukuthi yayisetshenziswa yilaba bantu ngenxa yezinhloso zobuhle.
Impushana ethambile ekhiqizwa ku-micaceous talc schist ukunikeza igama layo elilungile, yaxutshwa namanzi futhi yafakwa ebusweni.
....njengoba sibona lapha, izinto eziningi eziyisicefe edwaleni.
Ukukhiqizwa kwezingcezu zobucwebe - lena i-pendant engaqediwe, iphalethi elincane elincane.
futhi omunye umfanekiso ongaqediwe oshiya okuningi emcabangweni.
Indlela engichaza ngayo lezi zici eziyisicefe ukuthi abantu empeleni babegaya idwala le-talc ukuze bathole impushana.
Impushana ethambile yaxutshwa namanzi yagcotshwa ebusweni - okuyisiko elisetshenziswa esikweni lamaZulu nanamuhla ukufeza izinhloso zokuzicwala nezingokwesiko.
Ayisebenzi nje kuphela njenge-sunscreen kanye ne-moisturizer kodwa inokusetshenziswa okungokomfanekiso futhi.
Amantombazane amancane athunyelwa ngemiyalezo kwesinye isibaya nawo amemezela inhloso yawo ngokudweba okumhlophe ebusweni.
....bese kudwetshwa umzimba wonke ngomhloshana kuyisiko elisetshenziswa ekuthwaseni kwentsha yamaZulu namaXhosa.
Ubumba olumhlophe emizimbeni luwuphawu lokuzihlukanisa nomphakathi.
Ekupheleni kokuthwasa bayolahla izingubo zabo futhi bageze ubumba olumhlophe emizimbeni yabo.
Qalisa izangoma ngokwesibonelo ukugqoka i-ocher emhlophe ngesikhathi sokuqeqeshwa.
Uma usufanelekele izinguquko zombala.
Ngaleyo ndlela umphakathi wonkana uyakwazi ukubona isangoma esiqeqeshiwe nesinekhono.
Isangoma sinekhono ekuxilongeni izifo nasekulungiseni ama-muti.
Isimo sakhe kanye nomsebenzi wakhe kukhonjiswa yisigqoko sakhe kanye nemvunulo yakhe.
Ubuhlalu bugaxwa izihibe ukuze imimoya ebiziwe ibe nendawo yokuhlala lapho ikhuluma ezindlebeni zezangoma.
Amathambo esangoma abaluleke kakhulu kuso njengoba i-stethoscope ibaluleke kakhulu kudokotela ekuxilongweni kwaso.
Uwasebenzisela ukuxhumana namadlozi.
Imimoya yamadlozi ivunywa ukuthi ihlale ikhona - kuthiwe igada umndeni.
Kwenzelwe ngisho indawo yokulala eqhugwaneni.
Ngifuna ukukukhombisa okuthile kimi okubaluleke kakhulu.
Njengoba ubona lapha ngemuva kweqhugwane.....
njalo ngemuva kweqhugwana, kukhona lo mqansana.

Manje emva kwalolu gquma sekuyindawo engcwele kakhulu esikweni lamaZulu uma kwenzeka le ndawo okuhlala kuyona ngoba amaZulu akholelwa ekukhonzeni amadlozi futhi akholelwa ukuthi imimoya yamadlozi ibuthana ngemuva kwalesi sikhala esincane ebusuku.
Bakholelwa ukuthi kunesimbozo esincanyana phakathi kwaleli zwe nelizayo, yingakho bekhuluma nokhokho babo sengathi bangabantu abaphilayo ngoba bayasibona futhi bayasizwa.
Futhi babatshela ngamashwa abo kanye nezinhlanhla zabo futhi uma benza lokho, bafika ngemuva kweqhugwane bakhulume nabo.
Kwesinye isikhathi baba neziphuzo zikabhiya namadili okuhlonipha amadlozi bese bewabekele ukudla neziphuzo ngemuva kwalesi sikhala esincane.
Manje sebeyazi kusobala ukuthi ngeke besahlanganyela kodwa amadlozi ngoba bayasibona futhi bayasizwa kumele babone ukuthi izinto zenziwa ngokuhlonishwa kwabo bese izinto zibahambela kahle.
Ubuhlalu busetshenziselwa kakhulu kokubili izinjongo zokuhlobisa nezingokomfanekiso.
Kulo mdwebo wobuhlalu amaZulu aveza ukuthokozela kwawo umbala ngobuciko obungokwakuqala nobomuntu siqu.
Zigqokwa ngamadoda akwaZulu - uphawu lothando luqukethe umyalezo wothandiweyo wakhe.
Nakuba imibala inezincazelo ezivamile umlayezo ohlanganiswe esihlokweni ngasinye ungowomuntu siqu futhi ungaqondwa kuphela izithandani nabangane abambalwa abaseduze bomenzi.

Nakuba singakwazi ukufunda umlayezo onembile walezi zimpawu zothando, siyazi ukuthi umhlophe ubonisa ukuhlanzeka nothando, okubomvu kuwuthando oluningi naphezu kobumpofu, kodwa umbala obomvana ubonisa ubumpofu obukhulu, ikakhulukazi ukungakwazi ukukhokhela i-labola intengo yomshado kamakoti.

Abethulwa eNingizimu Afrika ngeminyaka yawo-1890 ababedonsa orisho, eminyakeni eyi-10 kamuva ukuthandwa kwaleli tekisi lale ndoda empofu kwase kukhule kangangokuthi abangu-2,000 bagcwala emigwaqweni yaseThekwini.
Abantu abangamaZulu banamuhla bangase bahluke kakhulu esizweni esifana nempi sekhulunyaka elidlule kodwa amasiko abo anothile aphila ukuze bonke bajabulele ikhulunyaka elizayo.
